product.title: Fender - Passenger / Right Side - 60 Series FJ60, FJ62, BJ 1980-1990
product.body_html:
Fits Toyota Land Cruiser FJ60 series 8/1980 - 7/1987

This high quality aftermarket fender is a direct replacement for FJ60 Land Cruisers. Fits Right / Passenger side. - This fender has the cutout on the side for the fender vent. Some BJ and HJ models do not include that cutout originally.

- Can easily be made to work for 8/1987 - 1/1990 FJ62. The only difference between the FJ60 and 62 fender is where the headlight door meets the fender. You would cut the spot welds and remove that portion from your original fender, and weld it in place on the new fender. (SEE PICTURES or call us for more details)

ANTENNA MOUNTING HOLE NOT PRE-CUT. 

This item is shipped LTL Freight and is eligible for FREE SHIPPING to any shop/business address that has a dock. Unfortunately, freight companies consider and house, apartment or any other dwelling place where people also reside as a residential address.  


A $100 surcharge will be added for any residential delivery.
